message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for you. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $1,050,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $1,150,000 is a very generous initial offer on my part given the value of this product.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,125,000.  This is my final offer, so I hope we can make a deal.

Alice, thank you for your revised offer. While I understand the value of the product, I must stick to my budget. I am now offering $1,075,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
